verses.verse: וַיִּסַּ֤ע <WH5265> vai-yis-Sa' took his journey יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El And Israel וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֔וֹ lo, וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo with all that he had and came בְּאֵ֣רָה be-'E-rah שָּׁ֑בַע <WH884> Sha-va'; to Beersheba וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <WH2076> vai-yiz-Bach and offered זְבָחִ֔ים <WH2077> ze-va-Chim, sacrifices לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> le-lo-Hei unto the God אָבִ֥יו <WH1> 'a-Viv of his father יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> yitz-Chak. Isaac

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him And God לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel בְּמַרְאֹ֣ת <WH4759> be-mar-'Ot in the visions הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> hal-Lay-lah, of the night וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said יַעֲקֹ֣ב׀ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; Jacob וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I הָאֵ֖ל <WH410> ha-'El I [am] God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha; of thy father אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> ti-Ra fear מֵרְדָ֣ה <WH3381> me-re-Dah not to go down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> mitz-Ray-mah, into Egypt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> le-Goy nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol of thee a great אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֥ <WH7760> 'a-si-me-Cha for I will there make שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there

אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I אֵרֵ֤ד <WH3381> 'e-Red I will go down עִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha you מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> mitz-Ray-mah, with thee into Egypt וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I אַֽעַלְךָ֣ <WH5927> 'a-'al-Cha and I will also surely גַם־ <WH1571> gam- will also עָלֹ֑ה <WH5927> 'a-Loh; bring thee up וְיוֹסֵ֕ף <WH3130> ve-yo-Sef [again] and Joseph יָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> ya-Shit shall put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha. upon thine eyes

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom rose up יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר mib-be-'Er שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> Sha-va'; from Beersheba וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U carried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- and the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem, their father וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et טַפָּם֙ <WH2945> tap-Pam and their little ones וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH802> ne-shei-Hem, and their wives בָּעֲגָל֕וֹת <WH5699> ba-'a-ga-Lot in the wagons אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sha-Lach had sent פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh which Pharaoh לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> la-Set to carry אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4735> mik-nei-Hem, their cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רְכוּשָׁם֙ <WH7399> re-chu-Sham and their goods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which רָֽכְשׁוּ֙ <WH7408> ra-che-Shu which they had gotten בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all זַרְע֥וֹ <WH2233> zar-'O and all his seed אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> it-To. for

בָּנָ֞יו <WH1121> ba-Nav His sons וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and his sons' בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> va-Nav sons אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> it-To, for בְּנֹתָ֛יו <WH1323> be-no-Tav with him his daughters וּבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> u-ve-Not daughters בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> ba-Nav and his sons' וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> zar-'O; and all his seed הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> he-Vi brought he אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> it-To for מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-ye-mah. with him into Egypt ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these שְׁמ֧וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im which came מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <WH4714> mitz-Ray-mah into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וּבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav; and his sons בְּכֹ֥ר <WH1060> be-Chor firstborn יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob's רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> re-'u-Ven. Reuben

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven; of Reuben חֲנ֥וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <WH6396> u-fal-Lu and Phallu וְחֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> ve-chetz-Ron and Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <WH3756> ve-char-Mi. and Carmi

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֧ל <WH3223> ye-mu-'El Jemuel וְיָמִ֛ין <WH3226> ve-ya-Min and Jamin וְאֹ֖הַד <WH161> ve-'O-had and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <WH3199> ve-ya-Chin and Jachin וְצֹ֑חַר <WH6714> ve-Tzo-char; and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul and Shaul בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽית׃ <WH3669> Hak-ke-na-'a-Nit. of a Canaanitish
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> le-Vi; of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> ge-re-Shon Gershon קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> ke-Hat Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> u-me-ra-Ri. and Merari

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עֵ֧ר <WH6147> 'er Er וְאוֹנָ֛ן <WH209> ve-'o-Nan and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֖ה <WH7956> ve-she-Lah and Shelah וָפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6557> va-Fe-retz and Pharez וָזָ֑רַח <WH2226> va-Za-rach; and Zerah וַיָּ֨מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died עֵ֤ר <WH6147> 'er but Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <WH209> ve-'o-Nan and Onan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons פֶ֖רֶץ <WH6557> Fe-retz of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron were Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <WH2538> ve-cha-Mul. and Hamul

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> yi-so-sh-Char; of Issachar תּוֹלָ֥ע <WH8439> to-La' Tola וּפֻוָּ֖ה <WH6312> u-fuv-Vah and Phuvah וְי֥וֹב <WH3102> ve-Yov and Job וְשִׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8110> ve-shim-Ron. and Shimron
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun; of Zebulun סֶ֥רֶד <WH5624> Se-red Sered וְאֵל֖וֹן <WH356> ve-'e-Lon and Elon וְיַחְלְאֵֽל׃ <WH3177> ve-yach-le-'El. and Jahleel

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei These [be] the sons לֵאָ֗ה <WH3812> le-'Ah, of Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom יָֽלְדָ֤ה <WH3205> Yal-dah which she bare לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko unto Jacob בְּפַדַּ֣ן be-fad-Dan אֲרָ֔ם <WH6307> 'a-Ram, in Padanaram וְאֵ֖ת <WH854> ve-'Et for דִּינָ֣ה <WH1783> di-Nah Dinah בִתּ֑וֹ <WH1323> vit-To; with his daughter כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נֶ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh all the souls בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> ba-Nav of his sons וּבְנוֹתָ֖יו <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tav and his daughters שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim [were] thirty וְשָׁלֹֽשׁ׃ <WH7969> ve-sha-Losh. and three

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons גָ֔ד <WH1410> Gad, of Gad צִפְי֥וֹן <WH6837> tzif-Yon Ziphion וְחַגִּ֖י <WH2291> ve-chag-Gi and Haggi שׁוּנִ֣י <WH7764> shu-Ni Shuni וְאֶצְבֹּ֑ן <WH675> ve-'etz-Bon; and Ezbon עֵרִ֥י <WH6179> 'e-Ri Eri וַֽאֲרוֹדִ֖י <WH722> va-'a-ro-Di and Arodi וְאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH692> ve-'ar-'e-Li. and Areli

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> 'a-Sher, of Asher יִמְנָ֧ה <WH3232> yim-Nah Jimnah וְיִשְׁוָ֛ה <WH3438> ve-yish-Vah and Ishuah וְיִשְׁוִ֥י <WH3440> ve-yish-Vi and Isui וּבְרִיעָ֖ה <WH1283> u-ve-ri-'Ah and Beriah וְשֶׂ֣רַח <WH8294> ve-Se-rach and Serah אֲחֹתָ֑ם <WH269> 'a-cho-Tam; their sister וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the sons בְרִיעָ֔ה <WH1283> ve-ri-'Ah, of Beriah חֶ֖בֶר <WH2268> Che-ver Heber וּמַלְכִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH4439> u-mal-ki-'El. and Malchiel

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei These [are] the sons זִלְפָּ֔ה <WH2153> zil-Pah, of Zilpah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan gave לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> la-Van whom Laban לְלֵאָ֣ה <WH3812> le-le-'Ah to Leah בִתּ֑וֹ <WH1323> vit-To; his daughter וַתֵּ֤לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led and these she bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> 'el-leh these לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko, unto Jacob שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> Na-fesh. souls

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons רָחֵל֙ <WH7354> ra-Chel of Rachel אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet wife יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob's יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yo-Sef Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> u-vin-ya-Min. and Benjamin

וַיִּוָּלֵ֣ד <WH3205> vai-yiv-va-Led were born לְיוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> le-yo-Sef And unto Joseph בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom יָֽלְדָה־ <WH3205> Yal-dah- bare לּוֹ֙ lo אָֽסְנַ֔ת <WH621> 'a-se-Nat, which Asenath בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter פּ֥וֹטִי Po-ti פֶ֖רַע <WH6319> Fe-ra' of Potipherah כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> ko-Hen priest אֹ֑ן <WH204> 'On; of On אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim. and Ephraim

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons בִנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin בֶּ֤לַע <WH1106> Be-la' [were] Belah וָבֶ֙כֶר֙ <WH1071> va-Ve-cher and Becher וְאַשְׁבֵּ֔ל <WH788> ve-'ash-Bel, and Ashbel גֵּרָ֥א <WH1617> ge-Ra Gera וְנַעֲמָ֖ן <WH5283> ve-na-'a-Man and Naaman אֵחִ֣י <WH278> 'e-Chi Ehi וָרֹ֑אשׁ <WH7220> va-Rosh; and Rosh מֻפִּ֥ים <WH4649> mup-Pim Muppim וְחֻפִּ֖ים <WH2650> ve-chup-Pim and Huppim וָאָֽרְדְּ׃ <WH714> va-'A-red. and Ard

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei These [are] the sons רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> ra-Chel, of Rachel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יֻלַּ֖ד <WH3205> yul-Lad which were born לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko; to Jacob כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh all the souls אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen
וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> u-ve-nei- And the sons דָ֖ן <WH1835> dan of Dan חֻשִֽׁים׃ <WH2366> chu-Shim. Hushim

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li; of Naphtali יַחְצְאֵ֥ל <WH3183> yach-tze-'El Jahzeel וְגוּנִ֖י <WH1476> ve-gu-Ni and Guni וְיֵ֥צֶר <WH3337> ve-Ye-tzer and Jezer וְשִׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH8006> ve-shil-Lem. and Shillem

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei These [are] the sons בִלְהָ֔ה <WH1090> vil-Hah, of Bilhah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan gave לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> la-Van which Laban לְרָחֵ֣ל <WH7354> le-ra-Chel unto Rachel בִּתּ֑וֹ <WH1323> bit-To; his daughter וַתֵּ֧לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led and she bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko these unto Jacob כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh all the souls שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> shiv-'Ah. [were] seven

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הַ֠נֶּפֶשׁ <WH5315> Han-ne-fesh All the souls הַבָּאָ֨ה <WH935> hab-ba-'Ah that came לְיַעֲקֹ֤ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko with Jacob מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ray-mah into Egypt יֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> yo-tze-'Ei which came out יְרֵכ֔וֹ <WH3409> ye-re-Cho, of his loins מִלְּבַ֖ד <WH905> mil-le-Vad including נְשֵׁ֣י <WH802> ne-Shei wives בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- sons' יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; besides Jacob's כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh all the souls שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim [were] threescore וָשֵֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8337> va-Shesh. and six
